title: Calories in Quaker Instant Oatmeal
meta_description: Discover calories in oatmeal Quaker instant per packet, including carbs, protein, fiber, and preparation tips for a quick breakfast.
assumptions: One packet (28g dry) of Quaker Instant Oatmeal, original plain flavor, prepared with water; no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, preparation method, added ingredients, and serving size. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One packet of Quaker Instant Oatmeal provides ~100 kcal and 3g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Prepared with 1/2 cup low-fat milk instead of water
Use maple & brown sugar flavored packet

faqs.q: How many calories in one packet of Quaker instant oatmeal?
faqs.a: About 100 kcal for the original plain flavor.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in calories in oatmeal Quaker instant?
Is Quaker instant oatmeal high in protein?
faqs.a: 4g protein per packet; pair with nuts or yogurt for more.

faqs.q: How does preparation affect calories in oatmeal Quaker instant?
faqs.a: Using water keeps it at 100 kcal; milk adds ~40-80 kcal depending on type.

faqs.q: Are there sugars in plain Quaker instant oatmeal?
faqs.a: 0g added sugars in original; flavored varieties have 12-13g.
